questions.question_text: Are fitting allowances for a specific diameter and type of fitting the same for all manufacturers?

options.A: A natural gas piping system operating at a pressure between 7 in w.c. and 14 in w.c. must not have a pressure drop greater than ________ w.c. = 1 inch
options.B: The pressure drop in a propane gas piping system of 11 in w.c. must not exceed _______ w.c. = 1 inch
options.C: Up to __________ w.c. is acceptable for a natural gas piping system operating at less than 7 in w.c. = 0.5 inch
